entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of the students in the Herbology class who are missing two members, Justin and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the students bringing up the rear with Harry and Dean.

entities.name: dean
entities.description: Dean is mentioned as one of the students bringing up the rear with Harry and Ron.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who has seen them out of the castle.

entities.name: justin
entities.description: Justin is mentioned as one of the two missing members from their number in the Herbology class.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of the two missing members from their number in the Herbology class and also as someone who was attacked by Harry.

entities.name: professor sprout
entities.description: Professor Sprout is mentioned as the teacher of the Herbology class.

entities.name: ernie macmillan
entities.description: Ernie Macmillan is mentioned as someone who apologizes to Harry for suspecting him and attacking Hermione.

entities.name: hannah
entities.description: Hannah is mentioned as Ernie's friend who comes to work at the same Shrivelfig as Harry and Ron.

entities.name: abssinian shrivelfigs
entities.description: Abyssinian Shrivelfigs are mentioned as the plants that Professor Sprout has set them all to work pruning.

relationships.description: Ernie apologizes to Harry for suspecting him and attacking Hermione.
Hermione is mentioned as someone who was attacked by Ernie.
Hannah is mentioned as Ernie's friend.
Hannah comes to work at the same Shrivelfig as Harry and Ron.
